title: Handle git diff errors gracefully in UI
description:
Ensure the UI handles git diff errors gracefully.

## Error Scenarios
- File not in a git repository
- File not tracked by git
- Invalid commit/ref
- Git not installed
- Permission denied

## UI Behavior
- Show clear error message in the tab content area
- Don't crash or show blank screen
- Suggest possible fixes (e.g., "This file is not in a git repository")
